name: Ancient Treasure -- 2D Platformer
description:
Three significant modifications

1) Design Modifications

  • All 3 levels are redesigned in contrast to sample project.
  • Each level has a different play area structure & difficulties.

2) Aesthetic modifications

  • Game theme is changed, all level have visual appealing backgrounds. 
  • Fonts, UI menu and button theme is changed.
  • All buttons and panel have new sprites.
  • New effects and animations are added.

3) Gameplay Modifications (New Scripts added)

  • Player movement speed power up is added.
  • New power bomb pick up which destroys all enemies but not easy to get.
